sql-case.value: SELECT 1 AS STATUS FROM performance_schema.global_status WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'MAX_EXECUTION_TIME_SET_FAILED' AND CONVERT(VARIABLE_VALUE, UNSIGNED) > @time_set_failed
select mysqltest1.f1()
select case 1*0 when "a" then "true" else "false" END
select case 1-0 when "a" then "true" else "false" END
select case 1+0 when "a" then "true" else "false" END
select case 1/0 when "a" then "true" else "false" END
SELECT o.order_id + 1 * 2 as exp FROM t_order AS o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT o.order_id + 1 * 2 as exp FROM t_order AS o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT ENCODE(test_datetype_col::bytea,'escape') FROM test_bytea
SELECT DATE(i.creation_date) AS creation_date FROM `t_order_item` AS i ORDER BY DATE(i.creation_date) DESC
SELECT * FROM t_order_item t WHERE t.status REGEXP ? AND t.item_id IN (?, ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order_item t WHERE t.status RLIKE ? AND t.item_id IN (?, ?)

select t.*,o.item_id as item_id,(case when t.status = 'init' then '已启用' when t.status = 'failed' then '已停用' end) as stateName from t_order t left join t_order_item as o on o.order_id =t.order_id where t.order_id=1000 limit 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? OR ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? || ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? XOR ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? AND ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? AND ? = t_order.order_id OR t_order.status = 'failed' AND ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? && ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE NOT (? = t_order.order_id)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ! ( ? = t_order.order_id)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? = t_order.order_id IS FALSE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? = t_order.order_id IS NOT FALSE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status IS NULL
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status <=> t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status >= t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status > ALL (SELECt status FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT IN (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id IN (?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id SOUNDS LIKE '1%'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT LIKE '1%' ESCAPE '$'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status NOT LIKE '1%'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT REGEXP '[123]'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT RLIKE '[123]'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id | ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id & ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id << ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id >> ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id + ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id - ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id * ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id / ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id DIV ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id MOD ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id % ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id ^ ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id + INTERVAL 1 SECOND
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id - INTERVAL 1 SECOND
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? < order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE now() < order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id collate utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE @@max_connections < order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? + t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? - t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ~t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE !t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE BINARY t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = BINARY ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ROW(?, now()) = (order_id, status)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE EXISTS (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ? )
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE {ts ?}
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id ->"$[1]"
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id member of("[1,2,3]")
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id ->> "$[1]"
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(order_msg -> '$[*].code', 'x', '$')
SELECT id, order_info->'$.id' FROM t_order where json_contains(order_info, ?, '$.id') limit ?, ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE MATCH (order_id) AGAINST (? IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE CASE WHEN order_id > ? THEN ? ELSE ? END
SELECT last_name, job_id, salary, department_id FROM employees WHERE NOT (job_id = 'PU_CLERK' AND department_id = 30) ORDER BY last_name
SELECT last_name, department_id FROM employees WHERE department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM employees WHERE last_name = 'Lorentz') ORDER BY last_name, department_id
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id NOT IN (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE location_id = 1700) ORDER BY last_name
SELECT 10+20,CASE order_id WHEN 1 THEN '11' ELSE '00' END,1 FROM t_order
SELECT CASE order_id WHEN 1 THEN '11' ELSE '00' END FROM t_order
select 1 & 1
select 1 | 1
SELECT ABS(1) FROM t_order WHERE ABS(1) > 1 GROUP BY ABS(1) ORDER BY ABS(1)
SELECT INSERT(phone, 4, 3, '***') AS 'phone' FROM t_order
SELECT REPEAT('MySQL', 3) FROM t_order
SELECT A(1) FROM t_order WHERE A(1) = 1 GROUP BY A(order_id) ORDER BY A(order_id)
SELECT A(1) FROM t_order WHERE A(1) = 1
SELECT TIMEDIFF(NOW(), UTC_TIMESTAMP())
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id COLLATE ?
SELECT * FROM cypher('sharding_test_1', $$ CREATE (n) $$) as (a agtype)
SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' FROM DUAL;
SELECT item_id BETWEEN 1 AND order_id, status FROM t_order_item;
SELECT DBMS_LOGMNR.MINE_VALUE(UNDO_VALUE, 'HR.EMPLOYEES.SALARY') FROM V$LOGMNR_CONTENTS;
SELECT (SYSTIMESTAMP - order_date) DAY(9) TO SECOND FROM orders
SELECT FEATURE_VALUE(nmf_sh_sample, 3 USING *) FROM nmf_sh_sample_apply_prepared
SELECT CLUSTER_PROBABILITY(km_sh_clus_sample, 2 USING *) FROM mining_data_apply_v
SELECT customer_id, cust_address_ntab MULTISET EXCEPT DISTINCT cust_address2_ntab multiset_except FROM customers_demo ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, cust_address_ntab MULTISET INTERSECT DISTINCT cust_address2_ntab multiset_intersect FROM customers_demo ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, cust_address_ntab MULTISET UNION cust_address2_ntab multiset_union FROM customers_demo ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT CAST(COLLECT(warehouse_name ORDER BY warehouse_name) AS warehouse_name_t) "Warehouses" FROM warehouses;
SELECT DBURIType('/HR/DEPARTMENTS').getXML() FROM DUAL;
SELECT DECODE(DBMS_COMPRESSION.GET_COMPRESSION_TYPE(ownname => 'HR'), 'No Compression') compression_type FROM DUAL;
SELECT PREDICTION_PROBABILITY(dt_sh_clas_sample, 1 USING *) cust_card_prob FROM mining_data_apply_v WHERE cust_id = 101488;
SELECT PREDICTION_SET(dt_sh_clas_sample COST MODEL USING *) pset FROM mining_data_apply_v WHERE cust_id = 100011
SELECT CURSOR(SELECT salary, commission_pct FROM employees e WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id) FROM departments d;
SELECT cust_id FROM mining_data_apply_v WHERE PREDICTION_BOUNDS(glmr_sh_regr_sample,0.98 USING *).LOWER = 24;
SELECT cust_gender FROM mining_data_apply_v WHERE PREDICTION (nb_sh_clas_sample COST MODEL AUTO USING cust_marital_status, aeducation, household_size) = 1;
SELECT PREDICTION_DETAILS(DT_SH_Clas_sample using *) FROM mining_data_apply_v WHERE occupation = 'TechSup'
SELECT PREDICT BY point_kmeans (FEATURES position) as pos FROM (select * from kmeans_2d limit 10);
SELECT inet '192.168.1.5' = inet '192.168.1.5' AS RESULT;
SELECT inet '192.168.1.5' <<= inet '192.168.1.5' AS RESULT;
SELECT ts_rewrite('a & b'::tsquery, 'a'::tsquery, 'c'::tsquery);
select int2(25.3);
SELECT elem_contained_by_range('2', numrange(1.1,2.2));
SELECT int8range(5,15) * int8range(10,20) AS RESULT;
SELECT int4range(2,4) <@ int4range(1,7) AS RESULT;
SELECT lower_inf('(,)'::daterange) AS RESULT;
SELECT 'super:*'::tsquery;
SELECT abbrev(cidr '10.1.0.0/16') AS RESULT;
SELECT set_masklen('192.168.1.0/24'::cidr, 16) AS RESULT;
SELECT text(inet '192.168.1.5') AS RESULT;
SELECT trunc(macaddr '12:34:56:78:90:ab') AS RESULT;

SELECT FileName = df.name, current_file_size_MB = df.size*1.0/128, max_size = CASE df.max_size WHEN 0 THEN 'Autogrowth is off.' WHEN -1 THEN 'Autogrowth is on.' ELSE 'Log file grows to a maximum size of 2 TB.' END, growth_value = CASE WHEN df.growth = 0 THEN df.growth WHEN df.growth > 0 AND df.is_percent_growth = 0 THEN df.growth*1.0/128.0 WHEN df.growth > 0 AND df.is_percent_growth = 1 THEN df.growth END, growth_increment_unit = CASE WHEN df.growth = 0 THEN 'Size is fixed.' WHEN df.growth > 0 AND df.is_percent_growth = 0 THEN 'Growth value is MB.' WHEN df.growth > 0 AND df.is_percent_growth = 1 THEN 'Growth value is a percentage.' END FROM tempdb.sys.database_files AS df
